long_description: The Ruffwear Web Master dog harness is a comfortable alternative to a collar. It offers great support for maneuvering and assisting dogs up and over obstacles when hiking or scrambling. The dog harness of choice for many avalanche rescue teams, it features an anatomical design that provides controlled, comfortable and balanced lifting and pressure dispersion. 5 points of adjustment provide a customizable fit and full range of motion; secure design helps prevent your hairy Houdini from wriggling out of the harness. Foam-padded straps at the chest and belly offer comfort for extended wear. 2 points of connection include an aluminum V-ring leash attachment (leash sold separately) at the front and a webbing loop at the rear. The Ruffwear Web Master dog harness has reflective trim for enhanced visibility in low light.
short_description: The Ruffwear Web Master dog harness is a comfortable alternative to a collar. It offers great support for maneuvering and assisting dogs up and over obstacles when hiking or scrambling.
